name: Animated Sentry Boss
description:
This game is currently not working

The game has several bugs and glitches that need to be removed before it is playable. 

The focus of this project is on procedural animation. 

The following assets are procedurally animated in this game:

  • The players movement
  • camera movement
    • camera tracks the player
    • camera reacts to user input
    • camera 
  • Security cameras
    • Security cameras track the player
  • Turret 
    • The turret continuously aims at the player
    • The turret will shoot at the player (not working)
